import React from "react"; import { NavLink, useLocation, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function ChannelButtons(){ const location = useLocation(); const channelId = useParams(); const isChannelHome = location.pathname === `/channel/${channelId}`; const isChannelVideos = location.pathname === `/channel/${channelId}/videos`; const isChannelAbout = location.pathname === `/channel/${channelId}/about`; return ( <>
{ isChannelHome ? ( ):( )} { isChannelVideos ? ( ):( )} { isChannelAbout ? ( ):( )}
) }
